title: Blawpaw
author: Blawpaw
content: I thought we should start a thread where we could speculate about who would be the teams meeting in this year's Soccer world Cup final.I was innitially predicting to see England vs Germany at the final, but the wway Germany demonstrated to have their team, it doesn't seem to me that they will get too far. From what I have seen from the first matches, I believe there is a strong chance of seeing a Spain vs England match at the final of the world cup. So, what are your predictions???Keep them coming!

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: I think that the Final will have most likely Argentina in it,there are a lot of conspirator theories that they lost intentionally the game with Saudi Arabia as they need to get second of the group in order to avoid Brazil early in the elimination stage.I also believe somewhat in this theory so the other team remaining to go far from their performance is England without a doubt who scored a lot of goals in their opening games and despite Iran not being a strong opponent still scoring 6 goals in a game says a lot to me,they should improve their defense a bit but for me England is one of the candidates to go to the final,so my final prediction is either one of these:Argentina vs EnglandBrazil vs England

comments.author: LDL
comments.body: I see four teams as favorites in the Qatar World Cup final, if Argentina can confirm the group stage, then these five teams, including Argentina,Spain France, England and Brazil, are very favorites in this World Cup.  In the last World Cup, Croatia was the favorite team in the final, but in this World Cup, Croatia is not the favorite team.  So I will make my prediction with five teams in the final.England, Brazil, France, Argentina, spainBrazil Vs EnglandSpain Vs FranceArgentina Vs EnglandEngland Vs France

comments.author: gantez
comments.body: I don't see England or Argentina in this. England allowing loose goals on them by Iran not good for me because a tough team won't be able to allow such loose two goals on them. They can score six goals but not to fantastic team.Germany loosing to Japan can give Japan the confidence going harder to the games.My prediction to this final is to see Spain, France, Brazil and Japan

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: This World Cup had a lot of drama so far – with some very surprising results – but we are still in the early stages of the tournament, so there can be plenty more twists and turns before the action ends. We have to expect that things will tighten up as we progressed into the knockout stage of the competition, with teams knowing that one mistake could be fatal for their chances of making it to the final.There are plenty more games still to come though, with the likes of France, Germany, England, Portugal, Spain, Netherlands, Brazil, and even Argentina still in the mix for glory, so there's still a lot to look forward to in this World Cup.

comments.author: jack05
comments.body: Quote from: FatFork on November 25, 2022, 04:09:45 PMThis World Cup had a lot of drama so far – with some very surprising results – but we are still in the early stages of the tournament, so there can be plenty more twists and turns before the action ends. We have to expect that things will tighten up as we progressed into the knockout stage of the competition, with teams knowing that one mistake could be fatal for their chances of making it to the final.There are plenty more games still to come though, with the likes of France, Germany, England, Portugal, Spain, Netherlands, Brazil, and even Argentina still in the mix for glory, so there's still a lot to look forward to in this World Cup. This year's World Cup hosts have created history. Equally, good team matches are surprising everyone. Easy wins are losing many teams. But now only the first round of the World Cup is going on. So now it cannot be said with certainty which team will win the World Cup.

comments.author: Doell
comments.body: Actually we don't know which country will qualify for the next round, but I will guess that Spain will be in a Final position, while the opponent will be Brazil or Saudi Arabia. How this Arab team beat Argentina, they are lucky Sir. The strongest candidate in my opinion is England, although this team has controversial defenders "sorry", but they have a great striker.

comments.author: iv4n
comments.body: Quote from: jack05 on November 25, 2022, 04:15:43 PMQuote from: FatFork on November 25, 2022, 04:09:45 PMThis World Cup had a lot of drama so far – with some very surprising results – but we are still in the early stages of the tournament, so there can be plenty more twists and turns before the action ends. We have to expect that things will tighten up as we progressed into the knockout stage of the competition, with teams knowing that one mistake could be fatal for their chances of making it to the final.There are plenty more games still to come though, with the likes of France, Germany, England, Portugal, Spain, Netherlands, Brazil, and even Argentina still in the mix for glory, so there's still a lot to look forward to in this World Cup. This year's World Cup hosts have created history. Equally, good team matches are surprising everyone. Easy wins are losing many teams. But now only the first round of the World Cup is going on. So now it cannot be said with certainty which team will win the World Cup.Really a lot of surprises at the very start, Japan unexpectedly beat Germany, and nobody believed that S. Arabia could win against Argentina... I was pleasantly surprised by Iran and their game today, it seems to me that South Korea played a good match yesterday, but unfortunately they didn't win even though they had nice chances. Well, after this start, it's hard to guess how things will unfold, there are still more games in the groups and somehow it seems to me that there will be more surprises.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: There's still a lot to surprise in every game, this is the group phase that's just started so we can't be sure which team will advance to the final but in this case, we have a favorite team of course there is something we have been thinking about since the world cup started thinking about it we certainly can't say that.Brazil, France, Argentina, Portugal, Germany, and Spain are big teams that we believe can qualify in the group phase and advance to the next round but that hasn't happened yet so there will definitely be drama in the world cup and we'll see about that later.But what I want in the final is Brazil vs Germany, it looks like it will be a final that many people, including me, want to see that match.

comments.author: ralle14
comments.body: Quote from: Blawpaw on November 25, 2022, 02:55:22 PMSo, what are your predictions???Those two teams had a solid showing but at the same time their opponents weren't good enough that's why they were able to show some dominance in their first game. For now, we're only in the second round of the group stages so i'd give other teams a similar chance since there could be a certain team that would suddenly look impressive once the playoffs start but at the moment I like France and Brazil to have a deep run.

comments.author: roslinpl
comments.created_time: November 25, 2022, 05:39:59 PMLast edit: November 27, 2022, 02:27:28 PM by roslinpl
comments.body: Soccer is all the time give importance by the fans around the world. Germany was the welcome team all around the world. If the sports was before their, their won’t be any war. Germany is the reason for all the war. But the people who suffered war also like the Germany players. This is the power of sports and Football, Brazil and Argentina was in the next place of people support. Among this three country will take huge advantage in the game. And France had a good chance of winning as compared to other nations. Recent game of Argentina loss made to understand, it can be beaten. So I was curious for the semi final.

comments.author: Franctoshi
comments.body: I'm pleased to see the brilliant performance of England this very tournament, they've really played very well in their games, nice team work and for this reason I'm tiping England and Brazil for the final game. Brazil in their own have also had their good play with the games they've played so far , so if they keep the fire burning, with the good squad they got it will help them to reach the final.

comments.author: rahmad2nd
comments.body: Actually to predict which team will appear in the final, it's more fun after entering the round of 16 later. we have seen, there are many that are completely beyond our predictions. Argentina, Germany really took us by surprise. I don't expect much for Argentina to win the title in this championship, even though Argen is our favorite team. to qualify for the next round phase, is still in doubt.  Previously I speculated that Argentina could at least make it to the semi-finals. even so, we'll see if they are able to escape from this group phase.On the other hand, from the start I would not doubt the Brazil squad at all. and proven, they played very impressively. on the other hand, England also played quite well, France, Spain who really played really well.I don't have predictions on other teams, apart from Brazil, who will be waiting for the final match. at least, once this group phase is over. we can conclude and predict based on the records and statistics of the team that will be championed that will go to the final match.

comments.author: rendravolt
comments.body: I actually want the Netherlands to face Brazil in the final. But seeing today's match against Ecuador who was able to hold their draw, it will be even more difficult for the Dutch journey to the final. Meanwhile, Brazil is still sufficient so far, they have more qualified attack variations. Regardless of the result, I am still optimistic that these two countries will reach the final of the world cup later.

comments.author: Blawpaw
comments.body: incredibly, no one is predicting to see Portugal coming to the final. Well, I'm portuguese, and I do not believe that Portugal willeven go to the quarter finals. In my view Portugal is not a steady team and Ronaldo is already a 3rd age player that cannot play the whole game. Of course that I would like to see them conquer the cup, specially because this would bring one more record to Ronaldo, but I'm afraid chances are pretty slim.

comments.author: rdluffy
comments.body: There are 2 main scenarios in my head, the first one, before the cup beginning, was Brazil vs ArgentinaAnd now, after 1st round completed, Brazil vs France is my second scenarioEngland and Spain can mess with both results abovea tip for you guys, in this website you can simulate 1st and 2nd ones of 1st round, and them simulate the matches until finalhttps://bolavip.com/en/world-cup-2022-simulatorThere are some groups that is easy to simulate, but group of Argentina and Germany are a mess right now

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Right now, it is difficult for me to accurately predict which teams will make it to the finals, with the way smaller teams are defeating big teams, it's a world cup Match event like no other I've seen before.For now, I would go with OP's prediction, which is Spain vs England, maybe as we move much further into the game, then accurately predicting which team will make it to the final rounds will become easier..Till then, let's keep watching, supporting our favorite team and as well enjoy the game.

comments.author: Anguwa
comments.body: Some teams are very fortunate to win in their first matches because of specific circumstances in the opening matches, while other big teams that people expected more from lost. However, given how strong some teams are, I believe they will recover.In the final, I suspect Brazil will face France.

comments.author: GiftedMAN
comments.body: In as much as England, France and Spain appeared to be difficult to defeat because of the big names in the team, I would love to see the two living legends, Ronaldo and Messi play against each other in the final so am predicting Portugal and Argentina to play the final so that between the two players one of them can end his football career with a world cup medal. Another team am going to predict to win the World Cup apart from the Portuguese team and Argentine team are the Brazilian team, you could see the level of team work they displayed yesterday, so I think between Portugal, Argentina, and Brazil one of them stand a better chance of winning the world cup.

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: In my mind Spain vs Brazil, what if they meet in the same final and have better abilities, especially from the squad which includes all lines of players filled with great players.One could say it's still too early but anyway this is just a prediction as one can expect to see the final match they can predict.There was Germany and Argentina but they lost early on to a small team this is a doubt again although we don't know what the future holds for the German and Argentinian teams (maybe reach the final)But I want to see in the final the big teams meet the big teams again.
